Detailed Description

This class provide methods for Runtime handle.

The RuntimeManager class provides methods for managing the notify.

The following example demonstrates how to use the RuntimeManager 

 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstenceState){


  Context* context = new Context(this);

 //new the RuntimeManager instance
 RuntimeManager *mAM = new RuntimeManager(Context);

 //new Runtime
 int flag = 0x10000000;
 Demand* demand = new Demand();
 demand->setClassName("com.example.runtimemanagertest", ".RuntimeManagerTest");
 PendingDemand* rtcIntent = PendingDemand::getPageN(this, *demand, flag);
